### 1. Barnes-Hut-SNE (Barnes-Hut implementation of t-SNE)

```{r}
#install.packages("Rtsne") # Install Rtsne package from CRAN
library(Rtsne) # Load package
iris_unique <- unique(iris)[,1:4]         # Remove duplicates
tsne_out <- Rtsne(as.matrix(iris_unique)) # Run TSNE
plot(tsne_out$Y,col=iris$Species)         # Plot the result
```

### 2. PCA (Principal Component Analysis)

```{r}
pca_out <- prcomp(iris_unique)
```
